headline.main: Utah Ads Featuring Mitt Romney Target Donald Trump

snippet: The “super PAC” formed to stop Donald J. Trump’s push for the Republican presidential nomination is spending $250,000 on television ads to run in Utah featuring Mitt Romney condemning the front-running candidate.
abstract: The “super PAC” formed to stop Donald J. Trump’s push for the Republican presidential nomination is spending $250,000 on television ads to run in Utah featuring Mitt Romney condemning the front-running candidate.

keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
keywords.name: subject
